product_title: Vornado 660 Large Whole Room Air Circulator Fan for Home, 4 Speeds and 90-Degree Adjustable Tilt, Removable Grill, 10 Inch, Floor Fan for Bedroom, Office, Black
about_product: POWERFUL VORTEX ACTION — Utilizes Vornado's signature Vortex air circulation to more effectively move air throughout the entire room. No matter where you are in the room, you can experience the power of a Vornado fan.

SIMPLE CONTROLS — Ready to go, right out of the box. The 4-speed push-button controls are easy to use and are conveniently located on the top of the circulator. The 660 Whole-Room Circulator is the perfect fan addition to any bedroom, home, or living room.

MULTI-DIRECTIONAL AIRFLOW — Easily adjust the direction of the Vornado 660 Circulator as it comes equipped with a stylish chrome glide bar that allows you to direct the air exactly where you need it most.

OPTIMUM PERFORMANCE — The 660 Whole-Room Circulator can be positioned, and effective, both on the floor or on a table. Deep-pitched blades paired with an inlet guide cone, enclosed air duct, and spiral grill help move air up to 100 ft.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT — Our standards are high, and so are your expectations. If our product doesn’t meet them, we’ll replace it, for up to 5 years. Products designed and supported in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U.S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U.S.
product_description: Product Description               Experience a new generation of airflow with the Vornado 660 Large Air Circulator Fan—a design-forward, performance-driven electric fan that brings both sophistication and power to any room. As a standout in the Vornado lineup, this sleek and modern air circulator fan is the perfect blend of form and function. With a premium mix of high-gloss and textured matte finishes, the 660 is a true design piece that complements any interior, from minimalist to contemporary. Engineered by Vornado, a leader in air movement innovation, the 660 is more than just a floor fan—it’s an advanced indoor fan that quietly and effectively circulates air throughout the entire room using signature Vortex Action. Whether you're looking for a fan for bedroom comfort, a stylish room fan, or a large plug in fan for your workspace, the 660 delivers consistent, whole-room airflow that elevates your comfort year-round. Its chrome glide bar adds an elegant touch and allows effortless 90º airflow direction adjustment without the bulk or clumsiness of traditional knobs. With sleek push-button controls positioned conveniently on top, you can easily switch between four speed settings—low, medium, high, and turbo—for customized airflow. Ideal for those seeking a quiet fan that doesn’t sacrifice performance, the 660 is whisper-quiet, making it perfect for bedrooms, offices, or media rooms. This high velocity fan is powerful enough to cool large spaces, yet refined enough to use as a fan for room aesthetics. It’s also a popular choice among those looking for floor fans for home. The high-gloss front grill is fully removable, making cleaning and maintenance easy and hassle-free. Whether you're shopping for a cooling fan, a stylish electric fan, or reliable fans that blow cold air, the Vornado 660 checks every box. Built for efficiency, engineered for comfort, and designed for today’s living spaces—it’s the powerful fan your home deserves.                  From the Manufacturer               IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.

customers_say: Customers find the fan powerful for its size, moving a lot of air around and cooling rooms effectively, with one customer noting it feels like air conditioning. They appreciate its compact design and reliable performance. The noise level receives mixed feedback, with some finding it relatively quiet while others say it's noisy. While some customers consider it well worth the money, others find it overpriced.

top_reviews.review_title: Mighty little fan, surprisingly quiet for the velocity.
top_reviews.review_comment: Powerful, relatively quiet, compact. I actually took it off the stand, and MacGuyver-ed it into a hole in my office door to exchange air with the rest of the house, while keeping my (very cute, very needy) cats at bay while I'm trying to work. It moves so much air that there's a lovely sheet of cool, fresh air rushing under the gap under the door (a little over an inch, hard floors) as the air rushes in to replace the output of this little beast.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great deal on price, quality and noise level.
top_reviews.review_comment: I wanted to get a quiet but effective fan for my room. After some research I decided to buy this vornado and I had it for over a year now. I mostly use it on the lowest setting and it is quiet enough for me and, if I direct it straight to me, can cool me down very quickly. The air flow is great and further than you'd expect. I also like the size a lot because I knew it'd help the air flow and noise reduction and I think this was the only model with the quietest mode.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Terrific fan - I’d get another in a second
top_reviews.review_comment: Does just as advertised. Strong, quiet, moves a lot of air around. At the moment (temp in 90s all this week) I’m sleeping with a window a/c on low and this fan moving air around not only the room it’s in but into connected spaces. Works beautifully. Keeps things cool with just a touch of ac to lower the air temp slightly. Even on medium easy to sleep through (and I’m a light sleeper). I also bought an ARA for stronger air movement on first floor. That’s a different beast for a different purpose (move air longer distance). I may also get another of these because it works so well at what it’s supposed to do. Vornado customer service (needed for ARA, not this) is fantastic.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Reliable, powerful fan. Just replaced a smaller sized Vornado fans after about 6 years of constant use. Makes it cooler in summer and warmer in the winter just by circulating the air in the room. Great fan
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Solid fan with great air circulation. The handle on it is a bit awkward (the old one I used to have and a “handle” in the top. Speed mechanism seems a bit flimsy.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Great fan! Pushes a great amount of air and has tolerable noise level at max speed. Quiet at medium speed(s). Excellent for large rooms. Height and fan speed adjustment is good. Great value for size and price.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Vornado Model 660: A Good Performer and Worth the Money
top_reviews.review_comment: Vornado Model 660 Fan: Vornado fans are not necessarily inexpensive fans, but I think they are worth the money. The model 660 is currently one of their largest floor models, and can move a lot of air. Right now, in the middle of being under a heat dome with temperatures reaching the high 90's and up to 100 degrees, I have been using mine constantly - sometimes by itself, and other times in conjunction with the AC. This Vornado 660 has four speeds; I found the lowest speed to be very quiet. As you increase the speed, the fan is understandably louder - as it would be with any fan. This fan does not oscillate, but you can change the angle from pointing down to the floor to up toward the ceiling. It is also supposed to be easy to open up to clean the blades, but I cannot comment on that yet, since I have only had the fan about two weeks.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Moves the air like a force of nature
top_reviews.review_comment: As a child, I loved the summer. As an older adult, I dread it, especially living in the Northeastern coastal U.S. As June approaches every year, I tell myself "this will be a bearable summer" and by late July, I feel like I am living out a prison sentence of punishment by extreme heat. 2022 has been especially brutal with several long heatwaves where the temperature was in the high 90s every day for weeks on end. It never went below the high 80s at night, so no relief. My rental house is nearly 100 years old with the windows being too rotted to hold an air conditioner or in some cases to even open. Since I moved back to the East coast, i have acquired nearly a dozen fans of all types-box fans, tower fans, tiny portables that clip to the edge of my desk. None have been particularly successful at keeping any room even reasonably comfortable. Earlier this year, in preparation for several months of heat torture, I bought a Vornado 630 for the bedroom. While it did not create a cool oasis for drifitng off to a comfortable sleep, it at least moved hot air around. As weeks went by and the heat waves got longer and my house retained more heat, I decided life was too short to be this uncomforatble and I bought this $100 Vornado 660. I used it last night for the first time on the highest setting along with the 630 on the other side of the room, also on the highest setting. I was able to sleep under a light coverlet. In addition, it was the first time since early June that I slept peacefully and comfortably all night long and woke up feeling refreshed and well rested. Even my youngest cat spent the entire night on the bed with me. Is it noisy? No. Sure, it sounds like a fan but I consider that white noise a plus as I live on a major artery in a very big city. It doesn't roar or rattle or rumble or hum so I do not understand the comments about this being a nuisance or detriment to sleep. Who cares if it has no remote control? Are we now all so lazy and helpless that getting up to push a button has become problematic or a major issue?! It was so wonderful to wake up in dry, not sweat soaked night clothes and to spend a pleasant 30 minutes gradually coming to full wakefulness while enjoying the company of my dear little cat, who also had a cool, restful night. As it is mid-August and the dog days are waning, I don't feel a need to immediately spend another $100 on a second Vornado 660 but I may very well purchase a second unit at the end of the summer as defense against next year's brutal weather. Global warming isn't going to go away but this fan can get one through some of the worst of the summer. Worth every cent. Highly recommend!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022

top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on September 16, 2020

top_reviews_global.review_comment: Es pequeño, un tamaño perfecto para ubicar en cualquier lugar. Aún en la velocidad menor, el flujo de aire es fuerte. El ruido es mayor al aumentar el nivel, sin embargo, en el nivel inferior el ruido es bastante bajo. Me ha funcionado perfecto para circular el aire.
nowhere did it state it wasn't compatible with European wall outlets.
top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in the Netherlands on August 14, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: We bought this for our room which we share with our 6 month old. On level one it's a very comfortable level and nice white noise too. On level two, I still don't mind the noise to sleep and it's super powerful! We point it toward the ceiling and it feels like we have AC on! Almost a little too cold sometimes. Our room is 12x11 ish. But I feel like this would be good for an even bigger room. I haven't used the other levels as we don't need to. They do get significantly louder the higher level you go and very powerful in output. The only problem is we have replaced this once as it started making a shaky noise within a month. But the company's customer service is amazing and they will send you a replacement right away. I think they have a 5 year warrenty? I'll never go back to a regular fan again!

como su nombre lo dice, es un aparato con gran potencia, por lo que también hay que considerar el ruido, que si te sirve de arrullo, te vendrá muy bien. Manejo práctico, nada complicado, uso al estilo antiguo, prendes regulas potencia y nada más. Debes tener en cuenta que no gira.
